metadata.title: CVE-2017-12101 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the'modifier_mdef_compact_influences' functionality of the Blender open-source3d creation suite v2.78c. A specially crafted .blend file can cause aninteger overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for codeexecution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince auser to open a .blend file in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
